oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Partial budgets
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Scharping, Brandon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: budget
revenue
costs
risk
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Utilizing partial budgets can assist veterinarians in making business decisions. It is important for the financial health of a veterinary practice to look at expanding services and thinking critically when purchasing equipment. This presentation aims to equip veterinarians with the knowlÂ­edge on how to create a partial budget, calculate a break-even point, develop a timeline for implementing a new service, and how to conduct a sensitivity analysis to assess risk.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 57 (2024): 2024 Recent Graduate Conference Proceedings; 115
